answers.answer: My sister had GD she had to get inculin once a day and was induced a week early. And has a beautiful baby girl with a full head of hair.

question: Went to the dr 4 days ago on dec 12th and took my 1 hour glucose test.. failed it. today I took my 3 hour test and failed it too. I have a dr appointment Thursday to find out everything I need to know, but 3 days seems soooooo far away!! Can anyone give me some advice on the gestational diabetes? Im scared my daughter will be unhealthy or have problems :(
title: Failed 3 hour glucose test today :(
